Text: Why do you re-up all this stuff? Appreciate the effort, but it' s been up here for a few weeks...
@Crash2701 Well i couldn't help notice that most of the uploads are in *Rar format, my uploads are RWP which benefits people using the legit copy of RailWorks
Oh, ok. Thanks for clarification. Didn't know that.
I just extracted the files & there is no setup file. How to install this game?

After completing the scottish east coast main line. some parts tells me that to continue on Part 2 will be released soon.. So can anyone tell me when Part 2 will be released? this is a great simulator and works perfect. Part 2 would be great to get my hands on.. Thanks :)
